title: Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince

description.en: Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince is a RPG game developed by Square Enix. It was originally released in 2023. Square Enix published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG. You can play Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince on Nintendo Switch.

sugerencias: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku o! ~Kib≈ç no Meiky≈´ Tsudoi Shi B≈çkensha-tachi~

description.en: After you die your soul moves on to where it suppose to. Heaven or hell. But if the body is denied its rest six feet under, the soul is doomed to stick around a little longer. The world's gone mad, broken, and cursed, and the last thing worthy of faith and reverence is the double-barreled shotgun at your side. They say that dead men tell no tales? Well, I do have one hell of a story to tell you...
description.es: Blood West is an immersive Wild West FPS where, as a revenant desperado, you take on the twisted demons and eldritch horrors, while you search for the means to end the curse that has befallen the frontier, and maybe find some peace for your wicked soul. One quest after another, the spirits of the land lead you towards even greater challenges. And whatever your path may be - things will get rough. For hell is empty and all the devils are here! In Blood West you will find:

description.en: You will take on the role of a Rogue Trader, a scion of an ancient dynasty of daring privateers, that reign over their own merchant empire and explore the fringes of Imperial space with the blessing of the Emperor Himself. Thanks to their Warrant of Trade - the Rogue Trader is endowed with privileges and power beyond imagination as well as the task of expanding the borders of the Imperium. At their disposal is a gargantuan voidship of immense power and innumerable servants and personnel ready to do the bidding of their lord. Their adventures begin in the vast Koronus Expanse - a treacherous region of unexplored space at the edge of Humanity‚Äôs domain.
description.es: Exploration will bring the protagonist to mysterious lost and forgotten worlds as well as numerous planets claimed by humanity - from lush Agri-Worlds to steel-clad Forge Worlds, all of them ready to be claimed for your burgeoning merchant empire or plundered for their riches. While travelling between the stars, get ready to come across potential allies and dangerous enemies of the Imperium, Chaos cults and alien Xenos counting among the most treacherous and deadly.

description.en:
Explore vast, open worlds where the magic of LEGO¬Æ building and Fortnite collide.
‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚ÄãCollect food and resources, craft items‚Äã, build shelter and battle enemies solo or‚Äã team up‚Äã with up to seven friends.
‚ÄãGet creative in building and ‚Äãcustomizing‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã your ultimate home base‚Äã using LEGO¬Æ elements collected from the world around you‚Äã, then recruit villagers to gather materials and help survive the night. Gear up and drop into deep caves in search of rare resources and hidden areas.
Find the ultimate survival crafting LEGO¬Æ adventure in Fortnite! The journey is only just beginning with new world building, gameplay features, and more LEGO¬Æ Style Outfits arriving in updates starting early 2024.
Includes the True Explorers Quest Pack.
Getting this experience is not necessary to access this content. When you launch Fortnite using this through your Library, the experience will be pre-selected for your convenience.
Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora‚Ñ¢ is a first person, action-adventure game developed by Massive Entertainment ‚Äì a Ubisoft studio, in collaboration with Lightstorm Entertainment and Disney.
description.es: Built using the latest iteration of the Snowdrop engine, and developed exclusively for the new generation of consoles and PC, Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora brings to life the alluring world of Pandora with all of its beauty and danger in an immersive, open world experience.

sugerencias: Assassin's Creed Valhalla - Dawn Of Ragnarok
Edge of Twilight ‚Äì Return To Glory

description.en: Become Gotham City‚Äôs ultimate protector across the iconic Batman: Arkham Trilogy.
description.es: Face off against notorious DC Super-Villains: The Joker, Scarecrow, Poison Ivy, and more in Batman: Arkham Asylum. Step into the shadows of Batman: Arkham City‚Äôs open world, the new maximum security ‚Äúhome‚Äù for thugs, gangsters, and insane criminal masterminds. In Batman: Arkham Knight, tear through the streets of Gotham and take on the ultimate threat in the trilogy‚Äôs epic conclusion.

sugerencias: Batman: Arkham Origins - Cold, Cold Heart
The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut

description.en: Simulator of a hunt for evil spirits in the setting of 17th century European occultism with the combination of the structure and principles of Diablo I and combat mechanics of the Resident Evil 7-8 series.
description.es: The main character by itself is a deadmen who dreams of the repose of his soul and for this aim he fights against monsters in the system of dungeons of the cursed church, built according to the principles of metroidvania.

sugerencias: Slayers X: Terminal Aftermath: Vengance of the Slayer
The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings Enhanced Edition
Japanese Rail Sim: Journey to Kyoto
Emergency Call 112 ‚Äì The Fire Fighting Simulation 2

description.en:
GOT WHAT IT TAKES?
Viewers at home, here's the news you've been waiting to hear: THE FINALS is accepting new contestants, and that means YOU! That's right, soon the world could be watching YOU tear apart our newest dynamic arenas and seize everlasting fame!
description.es: As you know, THE FINALS is the world's greatest free-to-play combat game show! Our contestants plug in to our virtual world and join teams in escalating tournaments. They fight it out in our beautifully-rendered arenas based on real-world locations that they can alter, exploit, and even destroy.

description.en: The Day Before is an open-world MMO survival set in a deadly, post-pandemic America overrun by flesh-hungry infected and survivors killing each other for food, weapons, and cars. You wake up alone in a world you no longer remember, setting out to find answers and the resources to survive.
description.es:
SURVIVE AT ALL COSTS
Search abandoned vehicles, houses, and skyscrapers as you scavenge for resources.

sugerencias: DEATH FIELD: The Battle Royale of Disaster

description.en: Neo Berlin 2087 is an action, shooter and RPG game. It is set to come out in 2024. You can purchase the game on Steam.

sugerencias: Fallout 3: Game of the Year Edition

description.en: Sleuth your way to the truth in two fully enhanced mystery adventures with Another Code: Recollection.
description.es: Travel to the remote Blood Edward Island as Ashley, a 13 year old girl in search of her father in Another Code: Two Memories. Ashley receives a letter from her father who she believed to be dead, setting off a chain of mysteries and visions into the past. Investigate your surroundings and locales while solving puzzles to reveal the truth in this refreshed retelling of the original Trace Memory game for the Nintendo DS system.

sugerencias: If you know what I mean
Metal Gear Solid: The Legacy Collection

description.en: Under Night In-Birth II Sys:Celes is a fighting game developed by FRENCH-BREAD. It is set to come out in 2024. It is set to be published by Arc System Works Co..
It's an upcoming horror Castle Rock first person shooter game will be coming to PC and consoles 2024

A Victorian steampunk RPG with tarot cards instead of dice. Investigate the disappearance of society‚Äôs most vulnerable to uncover a mysterious cult. Play as three characters, each with their own skills and motivations. Customize your characters with narrative choices to unlock new tarot cards.

title: The Last of Us Part II Remastered

description.en: Play the winner of over 300 Game of the Year awards, now remastered for the PlayStation¬Æ5 console. Experience for the first time or relive Ellie and Abby‚Äôs story with graphical enhancements, new gameplay modes like the roguelike survival experience No Return, full DualSense‚Ñ¢ wireless controller integration, and more.

sugerencias: The Dark Pictures Anthology: Little Hope

description.en: The TEKKEN series is breaking into a new era! The longest-running story in a video game franchise is coming back with state-of-the-art graphics and powerful new rivalries. Stay tuned for TEKKEN 8!

sugerencias: Lucha Libre AAA: H√©roes del Ring

description.en: Aurelia is set in a fantastic medieval world full of beautiful women and exotic races. The player will take the role of a young man that inherits his grandfathers house and on a sudden twist of fate becomes entangled with a magician.

title: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown

description.en:
UNLEASH YOUR INNER WARRIOR
Use your Time Powers, combat, and platforming skills to perform deadly combos and defeat time-corrupted enemies and mythological creatures.
description.es:
LOSE YOURSELF IN THE PRODIGIOUS MOUNT QAF
Discover a cursed Persian-inspired world filled with larger-than-life landmarks and explore a variety of highly detailed biomes, each with their own identity, wonder, and danger.

sugerencias: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (PS1)

description.en: Two larger-than-life heroes, Ichiban Kasuga and Kazuma Kiryu are brought together by the hand of fate, or perhaps something more sinister‚Ä¶ Live it up in Japan and explore all that Hawaii has to offer in an RPG adventure so big it spans the Pacific.

sugerencias: Final Fantasy VII Remake Episode INTERmission
